roleset.name: criminal punishment

example.name: Example with all but arg 0
example.text: his prison sentence for income-tax evasion

example.name: Arg 0 as a court body
example.text: many people would receive federal death sentences

example.name: Example with args 2 and 4
example.text: A prison sentence of less than three years

example.name: Example with args 3 and 4
example.text: A 30-year sentence for the self-confessed 1992 killing of his wife in Clinton Maryland
example.arg: for the self-confessed 1992 killing of his wife in Clinton Maryland

roleset.note: Roleset based on sentence.01. No corresponding VN class. Framed by Katie

roleset.name: What your English teacher made you write correctly and completely

example.name: Example with both args
example.text: His next sentence about a radio interview,

example.name: Example of the type of sentence to use this sense for
example.text: the first to use silences and sentence fragments and menacingstares, almost to the exclusion of what we previously understoodto be theatrical dialogue
